items.sentence: That probably didn't happen the way that Tom said it did.
Tom is wearing the same tie today that he wore yesterday.
I don't think that Tom will be going to Boston with Mary.
Tom texted Mary to let her know he had arrived in Boston.
Tom says he knows that Mary can't speak French very well.
Did you know both Tom and Mary have spent time in prison?
Don't you think that we should've stayed a little longer?
I've never met someone that I love as much as I love you.
Sometimes it may seem like we're not making any progress.
The more you study, the more you discover your ignorance.
Tom was aware of everyone's hostile feelings towards him.
I'm not sure whether I've made the right decision or not.
I promised my mother that I'd help her clean the kitchen.
Firefighters are some of the bravest people in the world.
Yanni checked Skura's temperature with a temperature gun.
Tom came out of Mary's office, carrying a stack of books.
Tom wondered if it would be hard to find a job in Boston.
You may not set up a roadside stall without prior notice.
Tom quickly packed a few things into a suitcase and left.
Nobody had even the faintest idea what might've happened.
